titleStmt.title: The last words of the reverend, pious, and learned Dr. Hammond. Being two prayers for the peaceful resettlement of this church and state
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Luke Meredith, at the Star in Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Prayers for the church and state.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
